column1: Whitwell was a settlement in the Shire.
Whitwell was located on the Green Hill Country
column2: not far from Tuckborough.In The Atlas of Middle-earth the name of this town was attached to an unnamed village west of Tookbank and south of Waymeet. Thain Paladin Took II
referring to the colour of the soil (presumably pertaining to wikipedia:chalk in the soil of the Green Hills).

column1: David Salo suggests that the name means "white spring"
Wikipedia:Whitwell is a real-life English place-name.
